00010 *  eigval() calculates the eigenvalues of "matrix"; its return value
00011 *  is the number of real roots, as found by quadratic_roots() applied
00012 *  to the characteristic polynomial (see polyroot.h)
00013 */

00019 /*
00020 *  rlvect() calculates the right and left eigenvectors of "matrix".
00021 *  In the argument list, "lambda" and "num_real_roots" should come
00022 *   from eigval(), and "family" is the eigenvalue family (0 or 1).
00023 */
